definition[0]: to use your effort, energy, abilities etc on doing the wrong thing
example[0]: Without well-defined goals, it is likely that efforts will be misdirected.
definition[1]: if a judge misdirects a jury (=the group of people who decide a legal case), he or she gives them incorrect information about the law
definition[2]: to send someone or something to the wrong place
example[2]: Our mail was misdirected to the wrong street.
